title: The Copter kids
creator_credit: Children's Film Foundation, Pacesetter Productions and Ronald Spencer
brief_description: A children’s comedy with a social message. A group of town kids form a vigilante group to stop an irresponsible cattle rustler and his two dim-witted sons from poaching cattle from Bramble Hollow to be sold to the European Communities.
creator_credit_for_label: Children’s Film Foundation, Pacesetter Productions and Ronald Spencer
